     int[] inX,
     int[] paY)
        CNode - A Node 'j', taking inputs from all parents inX and paY.
        Parameters:
        j - the label index of this node
        inX - attribute indices going into this node
        paX - label indices going into this node

        Transform - transform dataset D for this node. 0. Get, e.g., paY = [1,4] 1. remove everything except parents and self!, e.g., keep = [1,4,3]

      • build

        public void build(weka.core.Instances D,
         weka.classifiers.Classifier H)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Build - Create dataset D_j, and train a 'hTemplate'-type classifier on it. The dataset should have class as index 'j', and remove all indices less than L *not* in paY.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
